T
he Registrar or any person authorised by him, may preside at any meeting summoned
under Rule 18 (i) or 18 (ii) but shall have no vote; in the event of an equality of votes the
chairman shall have a casting vote.

(
iv) The Registrar or any person authorised by him, in writing by general or special order,
shall  be  entitled  to  be  present  and  to  speak  at  any  general  meeting  or  committee
Provided, however, that the Registrar or any person so authorised by him shall not have
the right to vote at any such meeting.
